author: jleroux
msg: To end gracefully the files generation process we must remove System.exit(1) here.
Inspired by a patch from Sankp for "Incorrect argument processing while Generating container" https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-4929 at r1355974 in R11.04

author: jleroux
msg: A patch from Sankp for "Incorrect argument processing while Generating container" https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-4929

The GenerateContainer.java source does not correctly process the arguments supplied in the command "java -jar ofbiz.jar -setup tomcat6" from OFBIZ_HOME. Running this command results in an error condition as given below
jleroux: I was pretty surprised by this fix, for 2 reasons. With the same command:
* The same file used in R10.04 generates the files and ends gracefully
* Almost the same file used in trunk generates the files, but did not end gracefully. The trunk file was changed recently but those changes are totally unrelated to this.
So I wonder why these changes are solving this issue in R11.04 but are not needed in trunk. Certainly intermediate change/s somewhere else which have been amended since.
